front.title: Multicast Extensions to DS-Lite Technique in Broadband Deployments

abstract.t: This document specifies a solution for the delivery of multicast service offerings to DS-Lite serviced customers. The proposed solution relies upon a stateless IPv4-in-IPv6 encapsulation scheme and uses the IPv6 multicast distribution tree to deliver IPv4 multicast traffic over an IPv6 multicast-enabled network.
